title: Expert Training Course for Pathological Classification of Oligodendroglioma

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Pathology and Experience in Digital Pathology Image Analysis
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on strengthening digital pathology diagnostic skills for medical device/pharmaceutical field practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 90% patch-level classification accuracy for digital pathology images of astrocytomas using a ResNet-50-based AI model.
Learners can quantitatively measure cell density and nuclear morphological features (aspect ratio, circularity, entropy, etc.) through the HTC framework.
Learners can achieve over 80% case-level classification accuracy by comparing key pathological features of three astrocytoma types (diffuse astrocytoma, anaplastic astrocytoma, glioblastoma).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
